explains: n. 护送者，护卫队，护航舰；（通常指异性的）社交聚会陪伴者，伴游；陪护，护送

sentences.en: My sister needed an escort for a company dinner.
sentences.cn: 我妹为了一个公司晚宴而需要一个社交陪同。

sentences.en: Police were called to escort her off the premises.
He arrived with a police escort shortly before half past nine.
sentences.cn: 快到9点半时，他由警察护送到达了。
